attributes.action: Extend theory test as practical test centres been closed for 7 months in 2020
attributes.additional_details: It’s the right thing to do, the learners haven’t done anything wrong but are being unfairly treated due to this pandemic
attributes.background: Get the DVSA to extended the 24 Month time limit for learners to pass practical test once passed the theory test, as test centres have been closed at least 7 months in 2020, they were happy to extend MOT’s for 6 months, thousands of learners have run out of time or running out who can’t get tests
